item.title: How to Contribute
item.description: First off, thanks for taking the time to contribute! ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ This file contains a few guidelines on how to contribute to the community made portal docs hosted at docs.bfportal.gg These are not rules but just some suggestion, so feel free to propose any change in the project Todo (PRs welcome :D ) Add a section on how to contribute to the docs Add a section on how to contribute to the website Add a section on how to contribute to the portal_blocks_documentation module Todo (PRs welcome :D ) Architecture of the docs Contributing to the docs Hand written Docs Portal Blocks Documentation Architecture of the docs The project is split into two parts:
